title: #309: "Allen v. Farrow" - Part 3
description:
Laura, Jim and Lisa continue their breakdown of the case of Dylan Farrow. Jim and Laura analyze the controlling behavior they see exhibited by Woody Allen over Mia, Soon-yi as well as Dylan. Lisa talks about a chance meeting with one of the young women who has claimed to be the muse for the role of the teenaged "Tracy" in Allen's movie "Manhattan".


#victimsmatter

#webelieveyoudylan

#HernameisDylanFarrow

#HernameisMiaFarrow

#AllenvFarrow

#hbodocumentary
